item.title: This group could put a stop to crypto and private equity in your 401(k)
item.description: The value of private equity and crypto coming to plans depends on whom you ask.

item.title: It will take a doozy of a jobs report to derail investor expectations for a September rate cut
item.description: Investors are gearing up for what was always going to be the week’s main event: Friday’s August jobs report.

item.title: Goldman Sachs to buy $1 billion stake in T. Rowe Price as more banks start offering private-market investments to individuals
item.description: Goldman Sachs and T. Rowe Price are teaming up to offer wealth and retirement clients more investment options from the world of private markets.

item.title: Meta paying an AI engineer more money than NBA superstar Stephen Curry? That’s a bubble ready to pop.
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg and other AI boosters show they’re players by spending money — not by making profits.

item.title: NFL fans can stream all games this season for the first time — and could end up paying less to do so
item.description: NFL games have long been the bastion of traditional linear TV, but for the first time this season, almost all NFL games can be watched on streaming pl...
